Understanding sequence: move, color, circle commands

Which program generates the following output?

... with a bit of surrounding text in next paragraph (inline not allowed).

Choose one correct answer:

move 50 50
color "red"
circle 10

move 50 50
color "red"
circle 20

move 40 40
color "red"
circle 20

move 60 60
color "red"
circle 10
